items.title: Maxwell interview about Epstein 'very productive', lawyer says
items.description: The questioning by a US official, which will resume on Friday, comes amid a public clamour for the release of Epstein files.

items.title: Former Congolese president on trial for treason
items.description: Joseph Kabila denies backing the M23 rebels, who have seized large parts of the mineral-rich east.

items.title: 'All the people are hungry': Voices from Gaza on desperate lack of food
items.description: All week across the BBC we've been hearing from people in Gaza about their lives as food supplies are restricted leading to malnourishment and starvat...

items.title: Thailand warns clashes with Cambodia could 'move towards war'
items.description: Intense fighting at the disputed border has killed at least 16 people and displaced tens of thousands.

items.title: Iran meets European diplomats for renewed nuclear talks
items.description: The talks are the first since Israel and the US attacked Tehran's nuclear facilities in June.
